title: Comments PopUp
behaviorsList: Popup max height will be 650px; depending on screen resolution, it can be shorter to fit the screen.
Only 5 lines of long comments will be visible initially. Clicking 'read more' will expand the full comment.
The title can display the main person's name with a profile picture or the main comment title with a matching icon.
The comment input section will always be fixed at the bottom.
This can be used without profile pictures as well.
Hovering over a comment will show the inline edit option and the delete option.
Can support star rating and like button components at the top right of each comment row.
Exiting the comment input will save the comment in real-time; inline edits will follow the same behavior.
